BE SIMPLE.
BE HAPPY.
REMAIN QUIET.
Do your work as
well as you can.
Keep yourself
always open
towards me.
This is all that is
asked from you.
-The Mother, CWM, 13: 77
renaissance.aurosociety.org renaissance.aurosociety.org

Be grateful for
all ordeals,
they are the
shortest way
to the Divine.
-The Mother, CWM, 14: 225
renaissance.aurosociety.org renaissance.aurosociety.org

Every one of you
should have an aim.
But do not forget that
on the quality of your
aim will depend the
quality of your life.
-The Mother, CWM, 12: 3
renaissance.aurosociety.org renaissance.aurosociety.org

Forget your difficulties.
Think only of being
a more and more
perfect instrument
for the Divine to do
His work and the
Divine will conquer
all your difficulties
and transform you.
-The Mother, CWM, 14: 225
renaissance.aurosociety.org renaissance.aurosociety.org

The Grace, the Grace alone can act.
That alone can open the way, that alone
can do the miracle.
-The Mother, CWM, 14: 91
renaissance.aurosociety.org renaissance.aurosociety.org

Do not trouble yourselves with what others do,
I cannot repeat it to you too often.
DO NOT JUDGE, DO NOT CRITICISE,
DO NOT COMPARE.
That is not your lookout.
renaissance.aurosociety.org -The Mother, CWM, 14: 273 renaissance.aurosociety.org

LEARN TO SMILE
ALWAYS AND IN ALL
CIRCUMSTANCES;
to smile at your sorrows
as well as your joys, your
sufferings as well as your
hopes, for in a smile there
is a sovereign power
of self mastery.
-The Mother, CWM, 14: 177
renaissance.aurosociety.org renaissance.aurosociety.org

Must go on smiling,
smiling still more when
the difficulties come.
Smiles are like rays of the
sun, they dissolve the
clouds… And if you want
the radical remedy it lies
in this: frankness, be
absolutely frank; tell me
fully all that is going on in
you, and soon the cure will
come, a complete
and happy cure.
-The Mother, CWM, 16: 101

One must have a sympathetic outlook and
learn to cooperate with one’s fellows, building
them up and helping them instead of sneering
at whatever seems not up to the mark.
-The Mother, CWM, 14: 273

“HE WHO CHOOSES THE INFINITE HAS BEEN
CHOSEN BY THE INFINITE.”
Never forget this promise of Sri Aurobindo and keep
courage inspite of all difficulties. You are sure to reach
the goal, and the more you keep confidence,
the quicker it will come.
-The Mother, CWM, 16: 144
